ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rpxr | |- ( R e. RR+ -> R e. RR* ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rpgt0 | |- ( R e. RR+ -> 0 < R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( R e. RR+ -> ( R e. RR* /\ 0 < R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_xblcntrps | |- ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ ( R e. RR* /\ 0 < R ) ) -> P e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR+ ) -> P e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) ) |
